Description:
Job SummaryWe are looking for a Thai Therapist for our subsidiary company Synergy Healing Centre. A candidate who should be a passionate, professional, reliable and confident massage therapist with specialist skills and relevant experience in Thai massage therapy. You should offer a full range of treatments to fulfil different client needs and objectives. You should have good interpersonal skills, be empathetic and have the ability to put clients at ease.As a therapist, you will be responsible for ensuring outstanding treatment service delivered to the Synergy Healing Centre standards.Responsibilities:Promote a warm, relaxed feeling for guests and anticipate their needs
Personalize each treatment to accommodate the individual needs of our guests.
Protect client data and ensure client confidentiality is maintained at all times
Follow established protocol to provide consistent, excellent service
Be extremely knowledgeable and able to accurately describe and sell services and products offered at Synergy Healing Centre
Provide information to the clients on the benefits of Massage
Maintain cleanliness, organization and restocking of treatment rooms
Responsible for ensuring cleanliness, room ambiance, and overall spa experience
Perform opening and closing responsibilities noted on the massage therapist/room checklist
Maintain excellent communication between activity in the treatment rooms and receptionists
Provide accurate information to the receptionists regarding the type and length of treatment provided to guestsSkills
Skills:
Previous experience as a therapist in a reputable environment
Excellent understanding of client care and treatment
Ability to work for and as part of a dedicated and passionate team
Good level of written and spoken English
Exceptional customer care skill
Excellent personal presentation
Confidence and professionalism when dealing with all profile clients
Knowledge of the following: Thai Massage, Deep Tissue Massage, treatments with accredited and recognised experience of traditional Thai massage therapy
Understanding and belief in the healing benefits of massage therapy and bodywork
